ComicInfo.Summary: Echoes of War, Finale: By blowing the Horn of Nergal, Sonja gains power to create an army of demon doppelgangers to fight the soldiers of Omar-Bes. They overwhelm and kill all before them. Sonja's friends Johndro, Barannes, Osric and Bollivar are trapped when the demonesses break through giving them a chance to escape. Sonja takes Yazmina with her as she escapes. Meanwhile back in Luxor, Azenathi uses her powers to see what Sonja has done and knows that Sonja is on her way back for vengeance. Her powers are of no avail when Sonja finally reaches her.
ComicInfo.Title: Echoes of War, Finale
